useCase.name: Book Reservation
useCase.description: Allows a member to search for, select, and reserve a book through the web interface.

mainSequence.step: Member navigates to the Reserve Book page.
Web Interface displays the search interface.
Reservation System queries books based on the parameters.
Member chooses a book and confirms the reservation.
Web Interface processes the reservation request.
Web Interface shows a success message to the member.
